# [Interview #1127: Figment Chat Q&A - January 19th, 2015, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1127#25)

#### Andrew

[Note: the question was likely “How do you pronounce Adonalsium?”]

#### Brandon Sanderson

Andrew, I pronounce it Ih-don-awl-sium.
